attributes.action: The length of killing should mean life for life
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for the length of murderers time in prison to stay at the convicted time as said by the judge

I want the goverment to agree to this because they are letting families down all over the country. I hate the way this system works. Its letting us down as a whole compared to other countries. I you take a life you should take responsilibilty if found guilty with sufficent evidence and not be allowed parole if they are well behaved inside. To me thats just an excuse. Do the crime Do the time...Stick to the phrase
